title: Beyond the boom: metal mining in Australia
creator_contributor_role: Australian Mining Industry Council, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Copper mines and mining
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Gold mines and mining
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Mineral industries - Australia - History
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Mines and mineral resources - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Iron mines and mining

description: The evolution of mining in Australia from the first gold discoveries to the iron, nickel and copper developments of the 1960's , its historic importance in national growth and economic stability and in the exploration and settling of much of Australia. The scope of modern mining and processing industries, exploration and prospecting, the growth of new towns and stimulation of regional development.
